text: Myristica longipetiolata is a species of plant in the family Myristicaceae. It is endemic to the Philippines. ==References== * World Conservation Monitoring Centre 1998. Myristica longipetiolata. 2006 IUCN Red List of Threatened Species. Downloaded on 22 August 2007. title: Myristica longipetiolata
